title: Why do I keep getting free skins from Riot?
body: For about a week now, I have been randomly getting free skins from riot, and they aren't old gifted skins. I'm not complaining or anything, but I'm really confused?

replies.body: Are you certain you're actually getting gifts? We've seen some players receive old gifting notifications after we recently re-enabled them once we resolved a previous bug with them.
I just got a silverfang Akali skin which I'm almost 100% certain I haven't gotten before
pretty much everytime i switch back to the old client i get a "gift from riot" notification. though i don't actually get anything i can find though.
